text: Sándor Sára (28 November 1933 - 22 September 2019) was a Hungarian cinematographer and movie director. He directed 16 movies between 1962 and 2004. His movie The Upthrown Stone was listed to compete at the 1968 Cannes Film Festival. His other works include: Ten Thousand Days (1967), Szindbád (1971) and 80 Hussars (1978). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cinematographers Category:Hungarian movie directors
title: Sándor Sára
